item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 13, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. WordPress.org's latest move involves taking control of a WP Engine plugin (83 points | 23 comments)
2. 1 bug, $50k in bounties, a Zendesk backdoor (1224 points | 352 comments)
3. Exploring Typst, a new typesetting system similar to LaTeX (336 points | 115 comments)
4. Can logic programming be liberated from predicates and backtracking? [pdf] (85 points | 11 comments)
5. Two never-before-seen tools, from same group, infect air-gapped devices (165 points | 119 comments)
6. Omni SenseVoice: High-Speed Speech Recognition with Words Timestamps (61 points | 15 comments)
7. Every bug/quirk of the Windows resource compiler (rc.exe), probably (131 points | 12 comments)
8. Lessons from Plain Text (20 points | 10 comments)
9. Show HN: AOO – C++ library for real-time audio streaming and messaging (69 points | 10 comments)
10. Heart rate variability differs between smartwatch and clinical testing (35 points | 20 comments)
11. FLUX is fast and it's open source (143 points | 62 comments)
12. Germany's 49-euro ticket resulted in significant shift from road to rail (530 points | 504 comments)
13. Washington's 'forgotten giant' volcano stirs (45 points | 17 comments)
14. Turkish language has a gossip tense (183 points | 156 comments)
15. How I animate 3Blue1Brown [video] (753 points | 152 comments)
16. DuckStation (152 points | 52 comments)
17. The 1/8th Sleep (110 points | 25 comments)
18. Hammer Looking for a Nail, AI Drone Looking for Business Case (19 points | 14 comments)
19. Tokyo looks to protect service staff from customers who are not so cool (26 points | 12 comments)
20. Lake Michigan Stonehenge – What have researchers learned? (73 points | 31 comments)
21. The Explore vs. Exploit Dilemma (30 points | 4 comments)
22. The unreasonable effectiveness of plasmid sequencing as a service (6 points | 1 comment)
23. Gödel Agent: A self-referential agent framework for recursive self-improvement (52 points | 19 comments)
24. Entropy Explained, with Sheep (2016) (44 points | 17 comments)
25. Psilocybin bests SSRI for major depression in first long-term comparison (482 points | 315 comments)
26. Some Notes on Upgrading Hugo (26 points | 9 comments)
27. Starship Flight 5 license issued by FAA (232 points | 194 comments)
28. “Bad Apple” in Minecraft (363 points | 53 comments)
29. About dn42 (12 points | 4 comments)
30. Putting a full power search engine in Ecto (133 points | 24 comments)
